DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetics NVP-1203 coadministration aceclofenac eperisone HCl SR .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Pharmacokinetic Characteristics Eperisone Aceclofenac With NVP-1203
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer , age 19 45 BMI ＞19kg/m2 ＜28kg/m2 subject Informed investigational nature study voluntarily agree participate study Use prescription medication within 14 day prior Day 1 Use medication within 7 day prior Day 1
